title: Bug: S Rank but never receive Chest
body: My teammates have been getting S a lot in previous games. And the Champ has not receive any chest before. Could you explain why I never get any chest.

replies.body: The teammate that gets an S must be in your *premade* to earn a chest for your champion.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=0dVyGOyP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-12T07:29:48.369+0000)
>
> The teammate that gets an S must be in your *premade* to earn a chest for your champion.

this

Do you have a "chest Charge". You can only get a chest every few days. Also its important you didn't already get a chest on the Champ you play Not in your teammates. And have you been premade with them or just randoms?
